text: Paratu jihara bada rasula da virodha karega ate imana vali'am de maraga tom binam kise hora maraga upara calega, halanki usa upara sresata maraga sapasata ho cuki'a hai, tam asim usa nu usa vala hi caî€¼lavange jidhara uha khuda phira gi'a hai ate usa nu naraka vica dakhila karange jihara bahuta bura tikana hai
